sources.title: La contessa azzurra (1960) Zsa Zsa Gabor, Amedeo Nazzari, Paolo Stoppa | Full Drama Movie
sources.description:
Loreley (Zsa Zsa Gabor) looks back to the happy times when she became a silent movie star.

Original title: La contessa azzurra (1960) 

Director: Claudio Gora
Writers: Luigi Bazzoni, Suso Cecchi D'Amico, Alberto De Rossi
Stars: Amedeo Nazzari, Zsa Zsa Gabor, Paolo Stoppa
Genre: Italian cinema, Drama
